actions.title: Actions
actions.deleteTip: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"?

password.setInvalid: The password is invalid, at least 8 characters, and must contain at least one letter and one number.

template.aiSubTitle: The first AI platform where teams collaborate on data and generate production apps
template.title: Template
template.description: Create a new base from a template

promptBox.placeholder: Build your business app with Teable

crmForArtists.title: CRM for Artists
crmForArtists.prompt: I'm an independent artist who needs to manage my collectors, artwork inventory, and sales pipeline. I want to track which clients are interested in specific styles, monitor my piece availability, record sales transactions, and keep tabs on upcoming exhibitions. I'd love insights into my best-selling works, identify repeat buyers, and get notifications when pieces are running low or important shows are approaching.

crmForRealEstate.title: CRM for Real Estate
crmForRealEstate.prompt: I'm a real estate agent who needs to manage my clients, properties, and sales pipeline. I want to track which clients are interested in specific properties, monitor property availability, record sales transactions, and keep tabs on upcoming open houses. I'd love insights into my best-selling properties, identify repeat buyers, and get notifications when properties are running low or important open houses are approaching.

crmForLawyers.title: CRM for Lawyers/Legal Practices
crmForLawyers.prompt: Our law firm handles client matters across various practice areas and needs to streamline case management. We track case progression, critical deadlines, billing cycles, and attorney workloads. I want oversight of our revenue streams, practice area distribution, and automated alerts for upcoming court dates, overdue invoices, and client check-ins.

crmForPhotographers.title: CRM for Photographers
crmForPhotographers.prompt: As a freelance photographer, I manage client bookings, shoot schedules, and deliverable timelines across wedding, portrait, and commercial work. I need insights into revenue by photography type, equipment usage, post-production workflow, and automated reminders for project deadlines and outstanding payments.

crmForHealthcare.title: CRM for Healthcare Practices
crmForHealthcare.prompt: Our medical practice manages patient records, appointment scheduling, and treatment protocols. We want to track patient visit history, treatment outcomes, follow-up compliance, and operational metrics. The system should send appointment reminders, schedule follow-ups, manage provider availability, and analyze our most successful treatment programs.

crmForInfluencers.title: CRM for Influencers/Content Creators
crmForInfluencers.prompt: I'm a content creator managing brand partnerships, content calendars, and audience engagement across multiple platforms. I need to track campaign performance, collaboration revenue, content metrics, and partnership deliverables. I want growth analytics, performance insights, and reminders for content deadlines and payment milestones.

crmForWeddingPlanners.title: CRM for Wedding Planners
crmForWeddingPlanners.prompt: I run a wedding planning business coordinating couples, vendors, and event timelines. I need to manage wedding budgets, task completion, vendor performance, and client satisfaction. The system should alert me to important wedding milestones, vendor contract renewals, and help me analyze our most popular wedding packages.

crmForFitnessTrainers.title: CRM for Fitness Trainers/Gyms
crmForFitnessTrainers.prompt: I operate a fitness studio managing member profiles, class schedules, and training progress. I want to track member engagement, attendance patterns, renewal rates, and trainer schedules. I need insights into popular class types, member retention, and automated alerts for membership renewals and low-attendance members.

crmForMusicians.title: CRM for Musicians/Bands
crmForMusicians.prompt: Our band manages fan relationships, tour logistics, and merchandise sales. We track concert ticket sales, fan engagement, merch inventory, and music performance metrics. We want to see our popularity across different markets and get automated fan notifications for new releases and upcoming shows.

crmForConstruction.title: CRM for Construction Contractors
crmForConstruction.prompt: I'm a general contractor overseeing multiple projects, client relationships, and construction timelines. I need to monitor project costs, material procurement, schedule adherence, and payment cycles. I want profitability insights, resource utilization reports, and alerts for project milestones and payment due dates.

codeReviewTracker.title: Code Review Tracker
codeReviewTracker.prompt: I'm a software developer who needs to manage my code reviews. I want to track which code reviews are pending, which ones are in progress, and which ones are completed. I'd love to see a list of all code reviews, their status, and the reviewers. I'd also like to be able to filter code reviews by status, reviewer, and project.

bugTrackingSystem.title: Bug Tracking System
bugTrackingSystem.prompt: Our engineering team needs to streamline bug reporting, triage, and resolution workflows. I want to track bug severity distribution, time-to-resolution metrics, developer workload balance, and identify recurring issue patterns. The system should prioritize critical bugs, assign based on expertise, and provide progress visibility to stakeholders.

sprintPlanningDashboard.title: Sprint Planning Dashboard
sprintPlanningDashboard.prompt: I'm a scrum master coordinating sprint planning, story point estimation, and velocity tracking for multiple development teams. I need visibility into team capacity, sprint completion rates, backlog prioritization, and impediment resolution. I want predictive analytics for delivery timelines and automated alerts for scope creep.

apiDocumentationManager.title: API Documentation Manager
apiDocumentationManager.prompt: Our development team maintains numerous APIs and microservices that need comprehensive documentation tracking. I want to monitor documentation coverage, API usage analytics, deprecation timelines, and integration health. The system should alert us to outdated docs, breaking changes, and help maintain API versioning consistency.

techDebtTracker.title: Tech Debt Tracker
techDebtTracker.prompt: I need to systematically track, prioritize, and manage technical debt across our codebase. I want to catalog legacy code sections, assess refactoring priorities, track improvement progress, and measure the impact of debt reduction efforts. The system should help balance feature development with maintenance work.

developerOnboardingSystem.title: Developer Onboarding System
developerOnboardingSystem.prompt: I'm responsible for streamlining the onboarding process for new developers joining our team. I need to track completion of setup tasks, skill assessment progress, mentorship assignments, and early productivity metrics. I want insights into onboarding bottlenecks and automated progress notifications for both new hires and mentors.

studentPerformanceTracker.title: Student Performance Tracker
studentPerformanceTracker.prompt: I'm an educator managing student progress across multiple courses and assessment types. I need to track attendance, assignment completion, grade trends, and learning objective mastery. I want early intervention alerts for struggling students, insights into successful teaching methods, and automated parent communication for progress updates.

courseContentManagement.title: Course Content Management
courseContentManagement.prompt: I manage curriculum development and content delivery across multiple educational programs. I need to organize learning materials, track content effectiveness, monitor engagement metrics, and coordinate with other instructors. I want insights into which content resonates best and automated scheduling for content reviews and updates.

onlineLearningPlatform.title: Online Learning Platform
onlineLearningPlatform.prompt: I run an online education platform managing student enrollments, course completions, and instructor performance. I need to track engagement metrics, completion rates, student satisfaction, and revenue by course type. I want predictive analytics for student success and automated recommendations for course improvements.

researchProjectManager.title: Research Project Manager
researchProjectManager.prompt: I'm coordinating academic research projects involving multiple students, faculty, and external collaborators. I need to track research milestones, budget allocation, publication progress, and resource utilization. I want insights into productive research patterns and automated reminders for grant deadlines and project deliverables.

schoolAdministrationSystem.title: School Administration System
schoolAdministrationSystem.prompt: I manage school operations including enrollment, scheduling, staff coordination, and resource allocation. I need visibility into classroom utilization, teacher workloads, student demographics, and budget management. I want operational insights and automated notifications for enrollment periods, staffing needs, and facility maintenance.

trainingProgramTracker.title: Training Program Tracker
trainingProgramTracker.prompt: I oversee professional development and certification programs for working adults. I need to manage enrollment cycles, track skill progression, monitor instructor effectiveness, and measure career impact. I want insights into program ROI and automated alerts for certification renewals and program improvements.

investmentPortfolioTracker.title: Investment Portfolio Tracker
investmentPortfolioTracker.prompt: I'm managing my investment portfolio across stocks, bonds, crypto, and real estate. I need to track asset allocation, performance metrics, dividend income, and rebalancing opportunities. I want insights into my investment patterns, risk exposure analysis, and automated alerts for significant market movements or rebalancing needs.

budgetManagementSystem.title: Budget Management System
budgetManagementSystem.prompt: I need comprehensive tracking of my monthly income, expenses, and savings goals across multiple accounts and categories. I want to monitor spending patterns, identify cost-saving opportunities, track progress toward financial goals, and receive alerts for budget overruns or unusual spending patterns.

debtPayoffPlanner.title: Debt Payoff Planner
debtPayoffPlanner.prompt: I'm managing multiple debts including credit cards, student loans, and mortgages with different interest rates and payment schedules. I need to track payoff progress, optimize payment strategies, monitor interest savings, and maintain motivation through goal visualization. I want automated reminders and payment optimization suggestions.

retirementPlanningDashboard.title: Retirement Planning Dashboard
retirementPlanningDashboard.prompt: I'm planning for retirement and need to track contributions across 401k, IRA, and other investment accounts. I want to model different retirement scenarios, monitor progress toward retirement goals, track employer matching, and optimize tax-advantaged contributions. The system should provide retirement readiness insights and adjustment recommendations.

taxPreparationOrganizer.title: Tax Preparation Organizer
taxPreparationOrganizer.prompt: I need to organize tax-related documents, track deductible expenses, monitor tax-loss harvesting opportunities, and prepare for annual tax filing. I want to categorize income sources, track business expenses, monitor charitable contributions, and receive reminders for important tax deadlines and document collection.

sideHustleRevenueTracker.title: Side Hustle Revenue Tracker
sideHustleRevenueTracker.prompt: I'm managing income from multiple side businesses including freelancing, rental properties, and online sales. I need to track revenue streams, business expenses, tax obligations, and profitability by venture. I want insights into my most profitable activities and automated tracking for business mileage and expense categorization.

taskManagementSystem.title: Task Management System
taskManagementSystem.prompt: I need to organize my daily tasks, project deadlines, and personal goals across work and personal life. I want to track completion rates, time allocation, priority management, and productivity patterns. The system should help me focus on high-impact activities and provide insights into my most productive working styles.

habitTrackingDashboard.title: Habit Tracking Dashboard
habitTrackingDashboard.prompt: I'm building positive habits and breaking negative ones across health, career, and personal development areas. I need to track consistency, identify trigger patterns, monitor progress streaks, and maintain motivation. I want insights into successful habit formation strategies and automated reminders and encouragement.

timeBlockingPlanner.title: Time Blocking Planner
timeBlockingPlanner.prompt: I use time blocking to manage my calendar and want to optimize my schedule for maximum productivity. I need to track time allocation across different activities, identify scheduling conflicts, monitor focus time availability, and analyze productive vs. unproductive time blocks. I want automated scheduling suggestions and protected focus time.

goalAchievementTracker.title: Goal Achievement Tracker
goalAchievementTracker.prompt: I'm working toward multiple personal and professional goals with different timelines and success metrics. I need to break down large goals into actionable steps, track milestone progress, monitor motivation levels, and adjust strategies based on results. I want visual progress tracking and automated check-ins for goal review.

energyManagementSystem.title: Energy Management System
energyManagementSystem.prompt: I want to optimize my daily energy levels by tracking sleep, exercise, nutrition, and work patterns. I need to identify what activities drain or boost my energy, monitor optimal working hours, track recovery periods, and correlate lifestyle factors with productivity. I want personalized recommendations for energy optimization.

digitalMinimalismTracker.title: Digital Minimalism Tracker
digitalMinimalismTracker.prompt: I'm reducing digital distractions and want to track screen time, app usage, notification patterns, and digital wellness metrics. I need to monitor progress toward reduced device dependency, track focused work sessions, and identify digital habits that support or hinder my goals. I want insights into healthy digital boundaries.

fitnessProgressTracker.title: Fitness Progress Tracker
fitnessProgressTracker.prompt: I'm tracking my fitness journey including workouts, strength progression, cardio performance, and body composition changes. I need to monitor exercise consistency, track personal records, plan workout rotations, and correlate fitness activities with energy and mood. I want insights into effective workout patterns and automated rest day recommendations.

nutritionAndMealPlanning.title: Nutrition and Meal Planning
nutritionAndMealPlanning.prompt: I want to plan healthy meals, track nutritional intake, monitor dietary goals, and manage grocery shopping efficiently. I need to track macronutrients, identify nutritional gaps, plan meals around dietary restrictions, and correlate nutrition with energy and health markers. I want meal suggestions and automated shopping lists.

mentalHealthJournal.title: Mental Health Journal
mentalHealthJournal.prompt: I'm tracking my mental health through mood patterns, stress levels, therapy progress, and coping strategy effectiveness. I need to identify emotional triggers, monitor medication effects, track therapy insights, and maintain consistent self-care practices. I want trend analysis and automated reminders for mental health check-ins.

sleepOptimizationSystem.title: Sleep Optimization System
sleepOptimizationSystem.prompt: I'm improving my sleep quality by tracking sleep duration, bedtime routines, environmental factors, and wake-up patterns. I need to correlate sleep quality with daily activities, monitor sleep debt, track bedtime consistency, and identify factors that improve or disrupt sleep. I want personalized sleep hygiene recommendations.

medicalRecordsManager.title: Medical Records Manager
medicalRecordsManager.prompt: I need to organize medical appointments, track health symptoms, manage medication schedules, and monitor health metrics over time. I want to prepare for doctor visits, track treatment effectiveness, manage insurance information, and maintain family health history. The system should provide health trend insights and appointment reminders.

wellnessChallengeTracker.title: Wellness Challenge Tracker
wellnessChallengeTracker.prompt: I'm participating in various wellness challenges and want to track progress across fitness goals, healthy habits, and lifestyle improvements. I need to monitor challenge completion, compare with friends or groups, track motivation levels, and celebrate achievements. I want social accountability features and progress sharing capabilities.

blogContentPipeline.title: Blog Content Pipeline
blogContentPipeline.prompt: I manage a content blog and need to track article ideas, writing progress, publication schedules, and performance metrics. I want to organize content by topic, monitor writing productivity, track engagement analytics, and coordinate with editors and collaborators. I need insights into high-performing content and automated publishing workflows.

socialMediaContentCalendar.title: Social Media Content Calendar
socialMediaContentCalendar.prompt: I'm managing social media content across multiple platforms and need to plan posts, track engagement, monitor brand consistency, and analyze performance. I want to schedule content in advance, track hashtag effectiveness, monitor audience growth, and coordinate campaigns across different social channels.

videoProductionTracker.title: Video Production Tracker
videoProductionTracker.prompt: I'm producing video content and need to manage scripts, filming schedules, editing progress, and publication timelines. I want to track video performance metrics, manage equipment and location bookings, coordinate with team members, and monitor production costs. I need insights into successful video formats and automated workflow notifications.

podcastManagementSystem.title: Podcast Management System
podcastManagementSystem.prompt: I run a podcast and need to manage episode planning, guest coordination, recording schedules, and publication workflows. I want to track listener analytics, manage sponsor relationships, organize episode archives, and coordinate post-production tasks. I need insights into audience engagement and automated guest communication.

newsletterCampaignManager.title: Newsletter Campaign Manager
newsletterCampaignManager.prompt: I manage email newsletters and need to track subscriber growth, content performance, send schedules, and engagement metrics. I want to segment subscribers, A/B test subject lines, monitor unsubscribe rates, and optimize send times. I need insights into content that resonates and automated follow-up sequences.

creativeWritingProjectTracker.title: Creative Writing Project Tracker
creativeWritingProjectTracker.prompt: I'm working on creative writing projects including novels, short stories, and poetry. I need to track writing sessions, word count progress, character development, plot timelines, and submission status. I want to maintain consistency in writing habits, organize research materials, and track publication opportunities and rejections.

tripItineraryOrganizer.title: Trip Itinerary Organizer
tripItineraryOrganizer.prompt: I'm planning multiple trips and need to organize flight details, accommodation bookings, activity schedules, and transportation arrangements. I want to track trip expenses, manage confirmation numbers, store important documents, and share itineraries with travel companions. I need automated reminders for check-ins and booking deadlines.

travelExpenseTracker.title: Travel Expense Tracker
travelExpenseTracker.prompt: I need to track travel expenses across multiple trips for both personal and business purposes. I want to categorize expenses, track currency conversions, monitor budget adherence, and prepare expense reports. The system should help with tax deductions and provide insights into travel cost patterns and optimization opportunities.

travelExperienceJournal.title: Travel Experience Journal
travelExperienceJournal.prompt: I want to document my travel experiences including photos, memories, recommendations, and ratings for places visited. I need to organize by destination, track travel companions, note favorite experiences, and maintain a bucket list of future destinations. I want to create shareable travel guides and preserve travel memories.

businessTravelManager.title: Business Travel Manager
businessTravelManager.prompt: I frequently travel for business and need to coordinate meeting schedules, track travel policies compliance, manage loyalty programs, and optimize travel efficiency. I want to monitor travel patterns, track time zones, manage corporate bookings, and ensure policy adherence while maximizing comfort and productivity.

groupTravelCoordinator.title: Group Travel Coordinator
groupTravelCoordinator.prompt: I organize group trips and need to manage multiple travelers' preferences, coordinate group bookings, track payments and deposits, and communicate updates to all participants. I want to plan group activities, manage dietary restrictions and special needs, and ensure everyone has the information they need for a successful trip.

travelPlanningResearchHub.title: Travel Planning Research Hub
travelPlanningResearchHub.prompt: I'm researching destinations and need to organize travel inspiration, compare options, track visa requirements, monitor weather patterns, and save potential accommodations and activities. I want to build detailed destination knowledge, track price changes, and maintain organized research for future trip planning decisions.

movieAndTvShowTracker.title: Movie and TV Show Tracker
movieAndTvShowTracker.prompt: I want to track movies and TV shows I've watched, plan my viewing queue, rate content, and discover new recommendations. I need to organize by genre, track progress on series, monitor streaming platform availability, and share recommendations with friends. I want insights into my viewing patterns and automated recommendations based on my preferences.

bookReadingProgress.title: Book Reading Progress
bookReadingProgress.prompt: I'm tracking my reading goals, book progress, genre preferences, and reading insights. I need to organize my reading list, track pages read, monitor reading speed, rate books, and maintain notes and quotes. I want to discover new books, track reading challenges, and analyze my reading habits for improvement.

gamingAchievementTracker.title: Gaming Achievement Tracker
gamingAchievementTracker.prompt: I'm tracking my gaming progress across multiple platforms and games. I need to monitor achievement completion, track time played, organize game libraries, and plan gaming sessions. I want insights into gaming patterns, track multiplayer sessions with friends, and maintain a backlog of games to play.

musicDiscoveryAndOrganization.title: Music Discovery and Organization
musicDiscoveryAndOrganization.prompt: I want to organize my music collection, discover new artists, track concert attendance, and manage playlists across different platforms. I need to monitor listening patterns, rate albums, track music purchases, and plan concert attendance. I want insights into my musical preferences and automated recommendations for new discoveries.

eventAndConcertPlanner.title: Event and Concert Planner
eventAndConcertPlanner.prompt: I'm planning events and concerts and need to manage guest lists, track RSVPs, coordinate transportation, and manage event budgets. I want to monitor attendance patterns, track event popularity, coordinate with vendors, and ensure everyone has a great experience. I need insights into event success and automated reminders for follow-ups.

hobbyProjectManager.title: Hobby Project Manager
hobbyProjectManager.prompt: I have multiple creative hobbies and need to track project progress, supply inventory, skill development, and time investment. I want to organize projects by type, track completion status, monitor costs, and document learning progress. I need insights into productive hobby time and automated reminders for project milestones.

tips.errorCategoryName: Category does not exist or has been deleted
tips.needSnapshot: Please create a snapshot before publishing, and the template name and description cannot be empty
tips.needBaseSource: Please select a base source before creating a snapshot
tips.addCategoryTips: Please enter a category name in search input first.

baseSelectPanel.title: Select template source
baseSelectPanel.description: Select a base to be the template

account.title: My profile
account.updateNameDesc: Your name will be displayed on contributions and mentions. You can change it anytime.
account.passwordDesc: Set a permanent password to login to your account.

changePassword.title: Change password
changePassword.desc: Please enter your current password and your new password.

changePasswordError.disMatch: Your new password does not match.
changePasswordError.equal: Your new password must be different from your current password.

changePasswordSuccess.title: ðŸŽ‰ Change password successfully.
changePasswordSuccess.desc: You will be redirected to the login page in 2 seconds.

addPassword.title: Add password
addPassword.desc: Set a permanent password to login to your account.

changeEmail.title: Update email
changeEmail.desc: Please enter your current password and your new email.

error.invalidConflict: The new email is already registered.
error.invalidSameEmail: The new email is the same as the current email.

success.title: ðŸŽ‰ Change email successfully.
success.desc: You will be redirected to the login page in 2 seconds.

deleteAccount.title: Delete Account
deleteAccount.desc: This action is irreversible. It will permanently delete your account and all associated data.

error.title: Unable to delete account
error.desc: You need to handle the following dependencies first:
error.spacesError: Before deleting your account, you need to leave your spaces(or delete and then go to trash) first.

notify.title: My Notifications
notify.label: Activity in your space
notify.desc: Receive emails when you get comments, mentions, page invites, reminders, access requests, and property changes.

setting.title: My Settings
setting.themeDesc: Select the theme for the app.

integration.title: Integrations
integration.description: You have granted {{count}} applications access to your account.
integration.revokeTitle: Are you sure you want to revoke authorization?
integration.revokeDesc: {{name}} will no longer be able to access the Teable API. You cannot undo this action.
integration.scopeDesc: This application will be able to get the following scopes:

name: Name

guide.createSpaceTooltipContent: Create a space to collaborate with your team.
guide.createBaseTooltipContent: A base stores your data and provides access to automation and apps dashboard.
guide.createTableTooltipContent: Create a new table or import an existing one here.
guide.createViewTooltipContent:
Create Grid, Gallery, Kanban, and Form views. Calendar views coming soon.

Choose the best view for your data management needs.
guide.viewFilteringTooltipContent:
Filter records by setting conditions. Filtered records are hidden, not deleted.

This only affects the current view, not your actual data.
guide.viewSortingTooltipContent:
Sort records by field values to organize them in your preferred order.

Sorting only affects the current view, not other views of the same table.
guide.viewGroupingTooltipContent: Group records by conditions to categorize and organize your dataset within a view.
guide.apiButtonTooltipContent: Access Teable's powerful API with nearly all product features using an Token.

dialog.title: {{spaceName}} space sharing
dialog.desc_one: This space has {{count}} collaborator. Adding a space collaborator will give them access to all bases within this space.
dialog.desc_other: This space has {{count}} collaborators. Adding a space collaborator will give them access to all bases within this space.
dialog.desc_billable_one: This space has {{count}} collaborator and {{billableCount}} billable user. Adding a space collaborator will give them access to all bases within this space.
dialog.desc_billable_other: This space has {{count}} collaborators and {{billableCount}} billable users. Adding a space collaborator will give them access to all bases within this space.
dialog.linkPlaceholder: Create an invite link that grants <0/> access to anyone who opens it.
dialog.collaboratorSearchPlaceholder: Find a space collaborator by name or email

base.title: Share {{baseName}}
base.desc_one: This base is shared with {{count}} collaborator.
base.desc_other: This base is shared with {{count}} collaborators.
base.collaboratorSearchPlaceholder: Find a base collaborator by name or email

pagePermissionChangeTip: Page permissions have been updated. Refresh required.

billing.overLimitsDescription: Your current subscription has exceeded its usage limit. Please upgrade your plan to continue using this feature without interruption.
billing.userLimitExceededDescription: The current instance have reached the maximum number of users allowed by your license. Please deactivate some users or upgrade the license.
billing.unavailableInPlanTips: The current subscription plan does not support this feature
billing.unavailableConnectionTips: Database connection feature will be removed and only available in Enterprise Plan and self-hosted versions.
billing.levelTips: This space is currently on the {{level}} plan
billing.automationRequiresUpgrade: Upgrade to Enterprise Edition (EE) to enable automation
billing.authorityMatrixRequiresUpgrade: Upgrade to Enterprise Edition (EE) to enable authority matrix

spaceSubscriptionModal.title: Upgrade space's subscription plan
spaceSubscriptionModal.description: You can only upgrade spaces where you are an owner

setting.description: Change the settings for your current instance
setting.allowSignUpDescription: Disabling this option will prohibit new user registrations, and the register button will no longer appear on the login page.
setting.allowSpaceInvitationDescription: Disabling this option will prevent users other than administrators from inviting others to join spaces. Enabling this option will allow directly invited users to create an account even if new account registration is disabled.
setting.allowSpaceCreation: Allow everyone to create new spaces
setting.allowSpaceCreationDescription: Disabling this option will prevent users other than administrators from creating new spaces.
setting.enableEmailVerificationDescription: Enabling this option will require users to verify their email address when creating a new account.
setting.enableWaitlistDescription: Enabling this option will allow users to register only with an invitation code.

brandingSettings.title: Branding settings
brandingSettings.logoUploadDescription: Upload Logo image, supports PNG, JPEG format, recommended size is 100x100px. Maximum upload size is 500KB.

ai.name: Name
ai.nameDescription: The name of the LLM provider
ai.enableDescription: Enable AI for current instance, all users will be able to use AI features
ai.addProviderDescription: Add a new LLM provider to the list
ai.baseUrlDescription: The base URL of the LLM provider
ai.apiKeyDescription: The API key of the LLM provider
ai.modelsDescription: The models supported by the LLM provider
ai.modelPreferencesDescription: The model preferences for the LLM provider
ai.embeddingModelDescription: Optional, usually the model ID contains "embedding"
ai.chatModelDescription: The chat model to use, Tips: md model default used for AI formula generation and related features

chatModels.smDescription: Used for tasks such as scene recommendation and simple quick operations
chatModels.mdDescription: For scenarios that require speed and quality, such as creating Base, it is recommended to use GPT-4o
chatModels.lgDescription: For planning, coding, and other complex task scenarios, it is recommended to use claude-sonnet-4

aiBasicCapability.title: AI Basic Capability
aiBasicCapability.description: AI Basic Capability, include AI table query tool, execute SQL query tool, generate script tool, table data visualization tool, update database information tool

baseResource.title: Base Resource Operation
baseResource.description: Create, modify, and delete tables, views, fields, and records through ai

suggestion.title: Suggestion
suggestion.description: Give suggestions based on the current database data and conversation content

chatModelTest.description: Test the ability of the model to handle image, pdf.
chatModelTest.notConfigLgModel: Please configure the lg model first
chatModelTest.confirmDescription: Do you want to test the large chat model's capabilities?
chatModelTest.missingCapabilitiesWarning: This model does not support image or PDF processing, which may cause some features to be unavailable.
chatModelTest.enableAIDescription: Model test completed. AI is not currently enabled. Do you want to enable AI to use these model capabilities?

ai.inputOrOutputTip:
The ratio represents the exchange rate between credits and tokens, e.g. "1:1000" means 1 credit â‰ˆ 1000 tokens.

Note: Each use will deduct at least 1 credit. Even if the actual consumption is less than 1 credit, it will still be charged as 1 credit.
ai.imageOutputTip: Image generation requires credits, each image consumes {{credits}} credits
ai.fillRequiredFields: Please fill in all required fields
ai.modelsRequired: Please fill in at least one model

webSearch.description: Configure Firecrawl API key to enable web search feature, access Firecrawl settings to get API key

tips.pleaseGoToConfiguration: Please go to the settings page to complete some initial configurations to enjoy the full functionality and a better user experience of teable

configuration.title: Pending configuration
configuration.description: Complete those configuration to get full features

publicOrigin.title: PUBLIC_ORIGIN environment variable
publicOrigin.description: Your {{envPublicOrigin}} environment variable configuration does not match the current access address {{currentPublicOrigin}}, import xlsx, csv, and attachment field functions may not work normally, it is recommended to set it to {{envPublicOrigin}}

https.title: Enable https
https.description: You have not enabled HTTPS, the large-scale copy (300 lines or more) feature will not be available, and it is recommended to enable it.

databaseProxy.title: PUBLIC_DATABASE_PROXY environment variable
databaseProxy.description: The PUBLIC_DATABASE_PROXY is not configured, the external database connection feature will not be available, please refer to the help document

llmApi.title: LLM API
llmApi.description: You have not configured the AI LLM API, AI Chat/ AI automation will not be usable, <anchor>go to setting</anchor>
llmApi.errorTips: You have not configured the AI LLM API, AI Chat/ AI automation will not be usable

app.title: App Generation
app.description: You have not configured the v0 API key, the App Generation feature will not be available, <anchor>go to setting</anchor>
app.errorTips: You have not configured the v0 API key, the App Generation feature will not be available

webSearch.title: Web Search
webSearch.description: You have not configured the web search API, the web search feature will not be available, <anchor>go to setting</anchor>
webSearch.errorTips: You have not configured the web search API, the web search feature will not be available

email.title: Email
email.description: No email configured, self-service password recovery, and email notification function will not be available, <anchor>go to setting</anchor>
email.errorTips: No email configured, self-service password recovery, and email validation / notification function will not be available

description.owner: Can fully configure and edit bases, automation, authority matrices and manage space settings and billing
description.creator: Can fully configure and edit bases, automation and enable the authority matrix
description.editor: Can edit records and views, but cannot configure tables or fields

trash.permanentDeleteTips: Are you sure you want to permanently delete "{{name}}" {{resource}}?
trash.resetTrashConfirm: Are you sure you want to empty the trash?
trash.description: Data in the trash still occupies record usage and attachment usage.

automation.turnOnTip: Do you want to turn on the current automation?

email.testEmailError: Please enter a valid test email address
email.testEmailSend: Test email sent successfully, please check your email
email.configError: Please enter a valid email config
email.hostDescription: Please enter the SMTP mail server address, for example: smtp.example.com

waitlist.title: Waitlist
waitlist.joinTitle: We're scaling fast to meet demand.
waitlist.joinDesc: Join wait list â€” we'll ping you the moment we're ready.
waitlist.thanksForJoining: Thanks for joining our waitlist. We'll notify you as soon as we have updates.

noPermissionToCreateBase: No permission to create base in any space
